LanguageData.EdB.PC.Dialog.Preset.Error.PartialSaveFa: Des problèmes sont survenus lors de la sauvegarde du préréglage. Certaines options n'ont pas été incluses.

LanguageData.EdB.PC.Dialog.Severity.Error.Required: You must select a severity level
LanguageData.EdB.PC.Dialog.UnrecoverableError.Message:
Un problème est survenu, et Prepare Carefully n'a pas pu résoude le problème. Le message suivant pourrait possiblement vous aider à l'identifier:
"{0}"
LanguageData.EdB.PC.Error.NotEnoughPoints: Vous avez dépensé trop de points.
LanguageData.EdB.PC.Error.NotEnoughColonists1: Vous devez avoir au moins un colon.
LanguageData.EdB.PC.Error.NotEnoughColonists: Vous devez avoir au moins {0} colon(s).
LanguageData.EdB.PC.Error.Initialization:
Prepare Carefully a échoué son initialization.
Ceci est souvant causé par un problème inattendu entre Prepare Carefully et un autre mod, mais pourrait être aussi causé par un problème de Prepare Carefully.
Avant de rapporter une erreur, veuillez essayer de découvrir quel(s) mod(s) pourrait causer ce problème. Si vous avez beaucoup de mods, vous pouvez désactiver vos mods par section pour découvrir lequel pourrait causer se problème.
LanguageData.EdB.PC.Page.ConfirmExit: Are you sure that you do not want to Prepare Carefully? Any changes that you made will be lost.
LanguageData.EdB.PC.Page.ConfirmStart: Are you sure that you are finished with your customizations? Confirm that you're ready to start!
LanguageData.EdB.PC.Page.Points.ScenarioPoints: The starting colonists and resources that were randomly generated for this scenario were worth {0} points.
LanguageData.EdB.PC.Page.Points.UsePoints.Tip:
Enable point limits if you want to maintain a balanced start by paying for skills, additional colonists and equipment from a fixed number of available points. Your starting points will match the point cost of the characters and resources that were randomly generated for your chosen scenario.
Disable point limits to prepare your starting colonists with no limitations.
LanguageData.EdB.PC.Page.Title: Prepare Carefully
Cannot wear the selected {0} with the following apparel:
LanguageData.EdB.PC.Panel.Appearance.WorldPawnAlert:
The game will often "redress" world characters, giving them new apparel and equipment before spawning them on the map. If you select a custom apparel option, those customizations will likely be lost if you eventually encounter the character.
This is not the case for faction leaders. If you make this character a faction leader, your apparel customizations will be preserved.
